name: LCA_COMM_ATTACH
description: This table contains information regarding attachments sent in a communication routing job. Information includes the report ID of the report sent, the letter ID of a letter sent, a file name if a blob server was used, the attachment description, the attachment name and the ID of the fax report sent.

columns.name: COMMUNICATION_ID
columns.description: Internal ID for communication management routing for In Basket and Chart Review audit trail records.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMM_REPORT_ID
columns.description: lrp report id of report sent in attachment

columns.name: COMM_REPORT_ID_REPORT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the report

columns.name: LETTER_ID
columns.description: hno letter id of letter sent in attachment

columns.name: OTHER_BLOB_IDS
columns.description: file name if a blob server was used other than the letter

columns.name: LETTER_BLOB
columns.description: file name if a letter blob server was used

columns.name: REPORT_BLOB
columns.description: file name if a report blob server was used

columns.name: DESCR
columns.description: description of the attachment

columns.name: ATTACHMENT_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the attachment date (LCA-350). This typically stores the date listed in the first date column on the Chart Review tab.

columns.name: FAX_REPORT_ID
columns.description: lrp id for faxes sent in the attachment

columns.name: FAX_REPORT_ID_REPORT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the report

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN
columns.description: The column serves as a link to EPT encounters whose reports/notes might have resulted in the creation of the LCA record.

columns.name: HNO_CSN
columns.description: CSN of a note that was routed

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the routed Episode.

columns.name: DXR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the routed DXR.

columns.name: LCA_COMM_LNO_ID
columns.description: Stores the LNO ID of the Patient Summary Extract routed from Chart Review

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: Contains the ORD ID of the order routed from Chart Review

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: Contains the RFL ID of the referral routed from Chart Review

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: Contains the DCS ID of the document/media routed from Chart Review

columns.name: IS_SUM_OF_CARE_ATTCHMENT_YN
columns.description: Whether this attachment is a Summary of Care
